abstracts.cdata!:
The Fifth Small and Medium Scale
            Enterprise Project will accelerate the growth rates of value
            added and employment creation of small and medium scale
            enterprises (SME), this will be accomplished through : (i)
            making modest changes in public policy and institutional
            mechanisms influencing SME access to longer-term credit;
            (ii) engaging Colombia's commercial and development
            Banks as SME loan intermediaries and the resources of these
            entities for this purpose; (iii) simplifying Bank loan
            processing and increasing technical cooperation to
            SME's; and (iv) preparing studies and recommendations
            during project implementation on policies influencing
            capital intensity, business establishments and operations,
            to help promote a neutral policy environment for SME development.
